name: Blue Torso: Wise Elder
description: A woodcarving torso with a stick that can be used to assemble an "Aranara Carving." It is painted blue and reminds people of a forest stream.\nNo fairy tale is complete without an Aranara elder. Like a giant tree in the forest, they use their wisdom to protect the little ones from the wind and rain. Most of them are amiable figures with a stick who stroke their beards as they tell stories within stories.
